flavorText: The goblins tracked the hystrodon with much stealth and cunning. Then they were eaten with much pain and yelling.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Goblins hatten sich heimlich und gerissen an das Hystrodon herangeschlichen. Sie wurden von ihm unheimlich in Stücke gerissen.
foreignData.name: Keulenschweif-Hystrodon

foreignData.flavorText: Los trasgos rastrearon al histrodón con mucha astucia y sigilo. Y luego fueron comidos con mucho dolor y gritos.

name: Macetail Hystrodon
originalText:
First strike, haste
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card from your hand: Draw a card.)

rulings.text: Cycling is an activated ability. Effects that interact with activated abilities (such as Stifle or Rings of Brighthearth) will interact with cycling. Effects that interact with spells (such as Remove Soul or Faerie Tauntings) will not.
